issue.title: com.spotify.music
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.spotify.music

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

api-partner.spotify.com

https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/ads-api/quick-start

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3080bd2a-8740-4c3e-bc58-4d0194b436d1)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: New filter
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

It is an ad that prevents clicking on the page, with this we will no longer have that problem.

### Proposed solution

www.hartico.tv###ad-container

### Additional information

This fixes it and works fine on hartico.tv/game

issue.title: projectelixiros.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://projectelixiros.com/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fprojectelixiros.com%2Fhome) ### Comment > The problem is already obvious, I want to express myself and the anger inside me, so what I write may not be quite right. > what the hell "open source" project doesn't allow ad blockers?! I can't even browse the website how do I know they're good? As if that wasn't enough, it also says "either turn it off or pay", I feel sorry for those who install this operating system on their phones, I wouldn't be surprised if one day they have to pay to unlock the screen. They're messing with the GitHub logo in the bottom left. I curse this revenue model. > I just wanted to write because they were so intrusive and I was so far away from (almost all) today's social media that I had no place to vent... > > I'm sorry and thank you for reading. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lhvxak8e0i88ows4g8scwogo04c8cowp9b47f10ahw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.10 System version: | iOS 15.8.3 (19H386) License type: | free DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist Other extensions used: | N/A
